title: Council Decision of 8 March 2012 appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
22.3.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 84/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 8 March 2012
appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
2012/C 84/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/75 of 10 February 1975 establishing the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training, and in particular Article 4 thereof (1),
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the French Government,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 14 September 2009 (2), the Council appointed the members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 18 September 2009 to 17 September 2012.
(2) A member's seat on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of Government representatives has become vacant as a result of the resignation of Ms Elisabeth ARNOLD.
(3) The member of the Governing Board of the aforementioned Centre should be appointed for the remainder of the current term of office, which expires on 17 September 2012,
main_body:
The following person is hereby appointed as a member of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the remainder of the term of office, which runs until 17 September 2012:
GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVE:
FRANCE Mr Jean-Marc HUART
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 March 2012.
For the Council
The President
M. BØDSKOV
(1)  OJ L 39, 13.2.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 226, 19.9.2009, p. 2.
